result.prevName: Hainan Development Holdings Nanhai Co., Ltd.

assetProfile.address2: 17th Floor No. 2061 Nanhai Avenue Nanshan District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Hainan Development HoldingsNanhai Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells curtain wall, interior engineering, photovoltaic glass, and deep processing of special glass in China. The company offers curtain wall products; office interior works, including office space, commercial complexes, airport, hotel, public buildings, and residential buildings; energy saving architectural glass, LOWE and double silver low-e glass, heat strengthened glass, tempered glass, laminated glass, heat curved glass, double curved tempered glass, digital printing glass, ceramic frit glass, and IGU; photovoltaic glass, including single and double suede AR toughened photovoltaic glass, back screen printing perforated photovoltaic glass, double layer high permeability AR toughened photovoltaic glass, high permeability aesthetic photovoltaic glass, 1.8-2.5mm series ultra-thin AR toughened photovoltaic glass, and large size photovoltaic glass; and electronic glass, such as strengthened glass, anti-reflective glass, anti-glare glass, magic mirror glass for LCD screen , coating glass for touch panels, super flat strengthened glass for copiers, glass for electronic scales and home electronic appliances, etc. Further, it offers special glass technology services. The company was formerly known as AVIC Sanxin Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hainan Development HoldingsNanhai Co., Ltd. in June 2020. Hainan Development HoldingsNanhai Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
